definition: to congregate/to assemble/to mass/to gather together/to amass/to polymerize

sentences.english: Economic factor is an internal basic factor in the cohesion of the Chinese nation.
sentences.chinese: 經濟因素是中華民族凝聚力的內在的基本因素。

sentences.english: Still, he described it as another positive development for European cohesion.
sentences.chinese: 不過將他形容爲一種歐洲經濟凝聚力積極發展。

sentences.english: It will also form our affinity and brand association.
sentences.chinese: 它也可以形成我們的品牌親合力與凝聚力。

sentences.english: A flocking bird is blind to the grace and cohesiveness of a flock in flight.
sentences.chinese: 結隊飛行的鳥對飛行姿勢和凝聚力是視而不見的。

sentences.english: These high levels of inequality erode social cohesion in the region.
sentences.chinese: 這些嚴重的不平等侵蝕了該地區的社會凝聚力。

sentences.english: We should not make the mistake of overstating their support or coherence.
sentences.chinese: 我們不能犯誇大他們支持和凝聚力的錯誤。

sentences.english: It also plays an important role in improving our prestige and national cohesiveness.
sentences.chinese: 它還能起到提高我們的聲譽，增強民族凝聚力的作用。

sentences.english: The coagulum power of multi - race nation serves as the adhesion of Singapore economy modernization.
sentences.chinese: 多民族國家的凝聚力是現代化的黏合劑。

sentences.english: Learning is helpful to improve the execution of the team.
sentences.chinese: 學習有利於提高團隊執行力，便於增強團隊凝聚力。

sentences.english: Nothing welds a family more than these.
sentences.chinese: 沒有什麼比這更能增加一個家庭的凝聚力了。

sentences.english: These concepts have far-reaching influence and play a active role for the formation and deve…
sentences.chinese: 它對中華民族凝聚力的形成和發展有積極的意義。

sentences.english: It was the first highly converged media experience.
sentences.chinese: 中國玩家初嘗高凝聚力的媒體遊戲體驗。

sentences.english: General McPeak speaks movingly of unit cohesion.
sentences.chinese: 邁克皮克上將有關團隊凝聚力的講話觸動人心。

sentences.english: You have shown us the unifying power of sport. www.rr365.com
sentences.chinese: 你們充分展示了體育的凝聚力。

sentences.english: In the Theactivities of the force who is the most cohesive server?
sentences.chinese: 在這次的活動力究竟誰是最具凝聚力的服務器？

sentences.english: With very high levels of social cohesion and a first-place ranking in education, New Zealanders trust and help each other.
sentences.chinese: 社會凝聚力級強，教育水平一流，新西蘭人互信互助。

definition: to twist together to form a rope/(fig.) to unite/to work together
to have the power to rally supporters
unity of will is an impregnable stronghold (idiom)
lit. like a sheet of loose sand/fig. unable to cooperate (idiom)
